mapper.select: select story_id, user_id, story_image, created_at, expires_at, user_name, user_avatar from active_stories_view
select story_id, user_id, story_image, created_at, expires_at, user_name, user_avatar from active_stories_view where user_id = #{userId} order by created_at asc
